Package com.yahoo.gondola

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Channel
    A channel is an abstraction that provides communication between the local member and a remote member.
    Clock
    This interface is used for any time-related functions.
    Network
    This class provides communication between the local member and remote members.
    Stoppable
    This interface is used by objects that create helper threads within their implementation.
    Storage
    The implementation of this interface must be thread-safe.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cluster  
    Command
    This object is used to commit entries into the Raft log.
    Config
    This class supplies all of the configuration information for the entire raft system.
    Config.ConfigMember  
    Gondola
    Usage to commit a command: Config config = Config.fromFile(confFile)); Gondola gondola = new Gondola(config, hostId); Cluster cluster = gondola.getCluster(clusterId); Command command = cluster.checkoutCommand(); byte[] buffer = new byte[]{0, 1, 2, 3}; // some data to commit // Blocks until command has been committed command.commit(buffer, 0, buffer.length);
    LogEntry
    These objects are returned by the Storage class.
    Member  
    RoleChangeEvent  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Role
    Enum to represent all three Raft roles.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IndexNotFoundException  
    NotLeaderException
